hero.tagline: Financial Judgement • Technical Execution • Full Accountability
hero.subtitle: We're the End-to-End Partner that aligns your technology with your business thesis. We think, direct, and build.

about.label: Our perspective
about.description_highlight: At Tauler Group we break the conflict of interest of conventional technology providers. We don't sell engineering hours. We sell audited impact on your bottom line.
about.description1: We operate as an Operating Partner. We have the strategic capacity to define the "What" (Business) and the technical power to execute the "How" (Code).
about.description2: From audit to production deployment. We take responsibility for the complete cycle of the technology asset.

stats.headline1: We seek Return on Invested Capital.
stats.card1_desc: We transform inefficient OPEX into net margin through automation and increase revenue through AI.
stats.card2_desc: Every €1 saved in operating costs multiplies by your exit valuation.
stats.card3_desc: We decouple your revenue growth from your cost growth. Grow more, spend less.
stats.card4_desc: We convert manual companies into Tech-Enabled companies, increasing the multiple the market pays for them.

approach.label: The Tauler Standard
approach.title: We're not a software factory. We're Efficiency Auditors.
approach.description: In a market saturated with empty promises and AI "Hype", we choose mathematical clarity. We don't sell what's trendy, we implement what works on the bottom line.
approach.point1_desc: Strategic consultants don't know how to code. Developers don't know finance. We are the hybrid that closes that gap. We design the strategy and have the technical capacity to build it. No intermediaries.
approach.point2_desc: Our greatest asset is not what we build, but what we prevent you from building. If a technology initiative doesn't have a clear financial return, we stop it before spending a euro. We protect your capital with the same diligence we would protect our own.
approach.point3_desc: We combine the execution agility of a tech company with the risk management rigor of a large corporation. Short sprints, tangible deliverables, and strict financial control.

services_section.label: End-to-End Partner
services_section.title1: You decide the level of intervention.
services_section.closing: We adapt our role to your need: Think, Build, or Direct.

service1.title: STRATEGY (Business Architecture)
service1.intro: Ideal when you have capital but don't know where to invest it for maximum return.
service1.result: A financial Master Plan, not a technical document.

service2.title: BUILD (Full Execution)
service2.intro: Ideal when you know what you need and want a turnkey solution, without managing complex teams.
service2.result: Technology assets in production that generate cash from day 1.

service3.title: GOVERN (Technical Direction / F-CTO)
service3.intro: Ideal when you have vendors or internal teams, but need external oversight, independent judgement, and strategic advisory.
service3.point3: Budget Control and Vendor Quality Assessment.
service3.result: Independent judgement to validate deliveries and protect your investment.

service4.title: PE PRACTICE
service4.intro: The specialized service for Funds and Corporate Transactions.
service4.point2: Post-Deal: Value Creation Shock Plan (Tech-Capital Value Creation).
service4.point3: Exit-Readiness: Company preparation to defend a Tech-Enabled valuation.
service4.result: Valuation Multiple Expansion and transaction risk mitigation.

benefits.label: Impact
benefits.benefit1: Capital Judgement: You stop spending on technology, you start investing in assets.
benefits.benefit2: Operational Velocity: Drastic reduction in Time-to-Market.
benefits.benefit3: Controlled Risk: Elimination of uncertainty in complex projects.
benefits.benefit4: Valuation Increase: Direct impact on the company's Enterprise Value.
benefits.benefit5: Peace of Mind: Knowing that an expert partner takes responsibility for the final result.
benefits.benefit6: Measurable ROI: Every technology investment has clear traceability to financial results.

tauler_group.label: Excellence
tauler_group.title: Tauler Group. The Strategic Technology Office.
tauler_group.description: We're not vendors. We're your partners in technology capital allocation. Schedule an initial diagnostic session to evaluate your efficiency potential.

team.description: At Tauler Group, we combine strategy, AI, finance, and business to elevate the businesses of tomorrow.

alvaro.name: Álvaro Toledo
alvaro.title: Co-Founder & Co-CEO
alvaro.qualification1_title: Data Science and Artificial Intelligence Engineer
alvaro.qualification2_desc: Manages development and operations teams for AI projects.
alvaro.qualification3_desc: Leads product vision and technical execution.
alvaro.description1: Álvaro directs the technological and operations strategy at Tauler Group. His focus is on integrating scalable AI systems that directly impact operational efficiency.
alvaro.description2: He combines AI engineering with a clear product and market vision, ensuring that technology solves real business problems.

manuel.name: Manuel Toledo
manuel.title: Co-Founder & Co-CEO
manuel.qualification1_desc: Universidad Complutense de Madrid and Universidad de La Laguna.
manuel.qualification2_desc: Resource management and operational process optimization.
manuel.qualification3_desc: Leadership in opening new markets and relationships with key clients.
manuel.description1: Manuel brings strategic and financial vision to Tauler Group. His experience allows translating the technical capabilities of AI into solid and sustainable business plans.
manuel.description2: He ensures that each project is not only technically viable, but generates a clear and measurable return on investment for our clients.

contact.label: Let's talk
contact.intro: Let's discuss how we can deploy maximum value.
contact.email_intro: Or if you prefer to write directly:
contact.form_success_message: We'll get in touch with you within 24 hours.

footer.tagline: We help companies navigate the AI era with strategy, honesty, and focus on results.

service_detail.cta_title: Shall we talk about how to apply this to your company?

diagnostico.title: AI Strategic Diagnostic
diagnostico.subtitle: Understand before investing
diagnostico.p1: Every relevant AI decision is, at its core, a capital allocation decision. The problem is that many companies invest without first understanding where AI can truly change the economics of the business.
diagnostico.p2: The AI Strategic Diagnostic is the mandatory starting point to avoid that mistake.
diagnostico.axes_title: This service analyzes the company from four inseparable axes:
diagnostico.axis1_desc: Where value is created and where it's eroded.
diagnostico.axis2_desc: Processes that limit efficiency, scale, or margin.
diagnostico.axis3_desc: Decisions that are made today with incomplete or late data.
diagnostico.axis4_desc: Real capacity to absorb technological change.
diagnostico.p3: We don't look for "interesting use cases". We look for economic levers.
diagnostico.p4: Each opportunity is evaluated with simple but uncomfortable questions:
diagnostico.q2: What happens if it doesn't work?
diagnostico.q3: What's the opportunity cost of not doing it?
diagnostico.q4: Does this problem deserve AI or does it deserve management?
diagnostico.result_title: The result is a clear picture of:
diagnostico.result2: Where it can reduce structural costs.
diagnostico.result3: And where it doesn't make sense to invest a single euro.
diagnostico.conclusion: This diagnostic doesn't accelerate decisions. It avoids wrong ones.

roadmap.title: AI Action Plan
roadmap.subtitle: Turning judgement into direction
roadmap.p1: Once you understand where the value is, the next risk is trying to capture it all at once.
roadmap.p2: The AI Action Plan is the natural evolution of the diagnostic: it converts the analysis into an ordered sequence of decisions, aligned with the business strategy and the company's financial capacity.
roadmap.questions_title: This action plan answers questions that are rarely well formulated:
roadmap.q1: Which initiatives should be done now and which can wait?
roadmap.q2: Which decisions are reversible and which are not?
roadmap.q3: Where is it better to learn cheaply before scaling?
roadmap.q4: What impact does each initiative have on margins, cost structure, and operational risk?
roadmap.priority_title: Each initiative is prioritized according to:
roadmap.p3: The action plan doesn't seek to maximize innovation, but to optimize risk-adjusted return. It introduces discipline, focus, and temporal logic that protects the long term.
roadmap.p4: In governance terms, the action plan makes AI something governable, defensible to the board and investors.

direccion.title: AI Transformation Project Management
direccion.subtitle: Execute without destroying value
direccion.p1: Most AI projects don't fail in design. They fail in execution.
direccion.p2: This service exists to ensure that what's defined in the roadmap materializes without strategic deviations, hidden cost overruns, or unnecessary over-engineering.
direccion.function_title: Our function is not to develop, but to direct:
direccion.function2: we prevent the project from growing out of control
direccion.function4: we protect the initial economic logic
direccion.layer_intro: We act as a governance layer between:
direccion.p3: This is especially relevant in projects with structural impact: deep automations, critical predictive systems, cross-functional platforms.
direccion.p4: Here the error is not technical, it's strategic: poorly made decisions today condition costs and flexibility for years.
direccion.conclusion: Our job is to keep the project within the limits that make it profitable, scalable, and sustainable.

executive_cto.title: Strategic Technology Office
executive_cto.subtitle: Governing technology as a strategic asset
executive_cto.p1: In companies of a certain size, technology ceases to be a function and becomes a financial asset. At that point, the technology role is no longer just technical: it's strategic, financial, and organizational.
executive_cto.p2: The Strategic Technology Office service covers that role at board level when independent judgement is needed, irreversible decisions are being made, or technology directly conditions the company's valuation.
executive_cto.perspective1_desc: Architecture, scalability, dependency, and real debt.
executive_cto.perspective2_desc: Impact on CAPEX, OPEX, margins, and risk.
executive_cto.perspective3_desc: Alignment with growth, focus, and positioning.
executive_cto.participation3: Support to CFO and CEO in critical decisions.
executive_cto.participation4: M&A processes, both buy and sell side.
executive_cto.conclusion: The Strategic Technology Office doesn't seek to accelerate for the sake of it. It seeks to preserve value and avoid mistakes that can't be undone.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy and Data Protection
privacy.section1_content2: Address: Plaza Curtidos Hnos. Dorta, 7 - 38005, Santa Cruz de Tfe.
privacy.section2_intro: Your data will be processed for the following purposes:
privacy.section2_item1: Managing the commercial relationship and service provision
privacy.section2_item2: Sending commercial communications about our services
privacy.section2_item3: Responding to your inquiries and requests
privacy.section2_item4: Improving our services and user experience
privacy.section3_intro: The processing of your data is based on:
privacy.section3_item1: The execution of a contract or commercial relationship
privacy.section3_item3: The legitimate interest of the controller
privacy.section4_content: Personal data will be retained as long as the commercial relationship is maintained and its deletion is not requested, and where applicable, for the years necessary to comply with legal obligations.
privacy.section5_content: Your data will not be transferred to third parties except for legal obligations or when necessary for the provision of the requested services.
privacy.section6_content: You can exercise your rights of access, rectification, erasure, restriction, portability, and objection by writing to info@taulergroup.com
privacy.section7_content: You can file a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency (www.aepd.es) if you consider that the processing does not comply with current regulations.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.section1_content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. These cookies allow us to recognize your browser and, if you have a registered account, link it to your registered account to provide you with a personalized experience.
cookies.section2_type1_item1: They allow navigation and the use of basic functionalities
cookies.section2_type1_item2: They are essential for the website to function
cookies.section2_type2_item1: They allow us to analyze the use of the website to improve our services
cookies.section2_type2_item2: We use Google Analytics and other tools
cookies.section2_type3_item1: They allow remembering information to improve your experience
cookies.section2_type3_item2: Such as the preferred language or the region you are in
cookies.section3_content1: You can configure your browser to reject all cookies or to receive a notice when a cookie is sent. However, if you reject cookies, some parts of our website may not function properly.
cookies.section3_content2: Most browsers accept cookies automatically, but you can modify your browser settings to reject them if you prefer.
cookies.section4_content: For more information about the use of cookies and your rights, you can contact us at info@taulergroup.com

teaser.headline: PE Practice
teaser.subheadline: We operate technology as a capital firm: We optimize EBITDA through algorithmic efficiency. Our success depends on the return of technological transformation.
teaser.hook: "Technology is the biggest value destroyer in a transaction if ignored—and the biggest multiplier if governed."

hero.headline: Tech-Capital Value Creation.
hero.headline_accent: We transform technology into Equity Value.
hero.subheadline: We act as technology Operating Partners for Private Equity Funds and companies in transaction processes. We mitigate risk at entry. We maximize the multiple at exit.

problem.headline: Technology is the biggest value destroyer if ignored, and the biggest multiplier if governed.
problem.intro: In the context of a transaction, technology is often treated as a "black box" or a cost center (IT). This is a miscalculation. Today, operational efficiency and technological scalability are the main determinants of EBITDA quality and, therefore, of the final valuation of an asset.
problem.intro2: Tauler Group does not operate as a service provider. We operate as Technology Asset Managers. Our function is to ensure that every euro of digital CAPEX has a direct return on the bottom line and on exit valuation.

solution.headline: Quadratic Impact on Return.
solution.headline_accent: Our intervention acts simultaneously on four dimensions of value:

levers.title: The 4 Levers
levers.lever1_desc: Transformation of inefficient OPEX into operating margin through process automation and resource optimization. Each unit of eliminated operating cost directly impacts available cash flow.
levers.lever2_desc: Multiplier effect: recurring operational savings are capitalized at the exit multiple. EBITDA improvement translates into equity valuation through the applicable market multiple.
levers.lever3_desc: Structural decoupling between revenue growth and cost growth. The technological architecture enables scaling operations without proportional increase in the fixed cost base.
levers.lever4_desc: Risk profile transformation through the transition from labor-intensive operational models to Tech-Enabled models. The reduction in operational risk and human dependency enables defending superior valuation multiples in exit processes.

scenarios.headline: End-to-End Intervention.
scenarios.subheadline: We cover the complete asset cycle, from risk detection to sale preparation.

pre.title: Forensic Tech Due Diligence
pre.subtitle: Buy-Side: Before signing, we audit the reality under the hood.
items: Hidden Tech Debt Identification: How much "surprise" CAPEX will the asset require?
Scalability Assessment: Will the technology support the Fund's growth plan?
Red Flag Report: Critical risks in security, intellectual property, and vendor dependency.

post.title: Efficiency Shock Plan
post.subtitle: Buy-Side: Execution of the value creation plan to improve operating cash flow.
items: Back-Office Automation: Reduction of administrative burden in Finance and Operations.
Revenue Generation: AI-based dynamic pricing, automated lead generation systems, conversion optimization, and average ticket increase.

exit.title: Valuation Defense
exit.subtitle: Sell-Side: We prepare the company to withstand buyer scrutiny.
items: Technology asset narrative to defend the sale price.

waterfall.headline: The Financial Waterfall
waterfall.description: We treat technology as a financial lever, not an IT expense.
waterfall.caption: Illustrative model based on typical engagement outcomes. Actual results vary by company.

offer.headline: Aligned Incentives (Risk Sharing).
offer.description: We understand the mathematics of return. We don't want to be another fixed cost (OPEX) in your P&L; we want to be partners in value creation.
offer.audit_fee: Audit Fee (Cost): A bounded fixed fee to cover the operating costs of the initial diagnosis or intervention.
offer.success_fee: Success Fee (Investment): A variable component directly linked to unlocked recurring EBITDA or transaction success.
offer.guarantee: If we don't improve operating margin, our cost is marginal. If we improve it, we share a fraction of the equity value created.

contact.headline: Let's talk about your next transaction
contact.headline_accent: or about how to unlock value in your current portfolio.
